title: New Music for Summoner's Rift Please?
body: What the title says. Please can we get new Summoner's Rift Music? It's been since 5 years >_>... getting some new music would probably be the best :D...

replies.body:
> Yep! It's coming....we promise. =)

QUICK, USE THIS!

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=QY2GnHLuRxU
WHAT ABOUT, IF YOU HAD MUSIC PACKS BUYABLE FOR IP AND IT'LL BE LIKE THE WARD SKINS AND ITS ANOTHER THING YOU CAN CHOOS AND AND AND AND...
Not a bad idea, but unfortunately impractical. Making a new track takes A LOT more work than a ward skin.
I don't know about you guys, but I'm loving the new Summoner's rift music! :D
yes please! I love the music to the pre beta footage! a pure eargasm!

haha i always forget this game has music ( i obviously mute it 100% of the time)

always get weirded out when watching streams or my gf play and im like whats that music ... wheres it coming from ... did i leave an Enya youtube vid tab open ... LOL music in this game ... why even bother lol

> haha i always forget this game has music ( i obviously mute it 100% of the time)
> 
> always get weirded out when watching streams or my gf play and im like whats that music ... wheres it coming from ... did i leave an Enya youtube vid tab open ... LOL music in this game ... why even bother lol

I began muting SR's music when someone was streaming was my team and decided to bounce on in. I didn't like hearing music echo, so I turned it off. After the stream, I liked the music off a lot more because it helped me focus a lot more than usual, concerning I have ADHD.
...I turn on the music for Howling Abyss and Crystal Scar.
